DOC.brief_summary: Questionnaire to measure and control the quality of life of patients with hay fever who are treated or were treated with Pollinex quattro
DOC.brief_title: Untersuchung Zur Erfassung Und Kontrolle Der Lebensqualit√§t Unter Einer Therapie Mit Pollinex Quattro Bei Heuschnupfen
DOC.detailed_description: Questionnaire including 19 questions concerning the Quality of life of patients with hayfeyer under or after therapy with a specific immuntherapy with Pollinex quattro
DOC.criteria: Pollinosis/seasonal Rhinitis based on an allergy against birch/alder/Hazel pollen OR grass/rye pollen OR mugwort Therapy with Polinex quattro Age <18 years.
DOC.keyword: pollinosis, quality of life, specific immunotherapy
